heading: Today
text: Morning snow, up to an additional inch, mixed with some sleet in NY, and some freezing rain in southern valleys, tapering to snow showers north, and ending south.  Highs from the low 30s north, to upper 30s south.  Winds light, becoming west up to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clouds.  Lows in the 20s.  Winds northwest less than 10 mph, becoming light and variable.

heading: Thursday
text: Morning clouds giving way to sunshine south, with some afternoon clearing north.  Highs in the 30s north, 40 to 45 south.  Winds light and variable.
